content: Hello,I found the following articles about the Ethereum price and needs to know is it OK? :https://www.bitcoinsensus.com/ethereum-price-prediction-daily-13-march-eth-price-short-squeezing-to-the-upside-start-of-a-new-bull-run/This is not a financial advice, please share your opinions about the price of the Ethereum in this week. If possible, only mention the price.Thank you.

comments.author: fvb
comments.body: Well, as if everything is written meaningfully and it looks like the analysis of the author of the article. But as an argument in favor of investing in ETH, this did not give me anything. Because even so, if possible, I buy more from time to time for the long term

comments.author: hack3rcon
comments.body: Hello,Thank you for your reply.I would like a price forecast for the weekend.
